mama jawipe gana darana mathaya hamoma dannawane.eeth jawipe mehema diyawena eka gana nam mata thibenne kanagatuwak.mata bayak thibenawa eelanga parlimenthuwe jewi pi niyojanaya binduwa weyida kiya.mama je wi piyata manapa dun kale mage sithiwili mama kiyannam.ee widiyata thama hungak shri lanka karayo hithuwe.palamu manapaya je wi pi ekata dila dewani manapaya thamnge paksheta dunna shri lanka karaya balaporoththuwune thamange pakshe nayakayata wada je wi pi karaya hondayi kiayan eka.me kramaya thawa awurudu dahayak pahalowak issarahata genichcha nam shri lanka ekata chanda dayakayo aanayanaya karanna wenawa.eeth je wi pi ekata kate tharamata wada na.wada karanawata wada udghoshana karana eka lesiyi.manthriwaru hathalihak sitiya welawe aanduwa yahamangata gaththa nam yu an pi eken horu aanayanaya karanna wenne na.je wi pi eka bala sitiye mahinda yudde anagannakam kiyalayi mata hithune.
